onboarding1.title: Pošiljajte, prejemajte in upravljajte svoje IOTA žetone
onboarding1.body: Firefly je uradna softverska denarnica kriptovalute IOTA.

legal.title: Pravilnik o zasebnosti in pogoji storitve
legal.body: Prosimo, preglejte politiko zasebnosti in pogoje storitve.
legal.checkbox: Prebral sem in sprejemam politiko zasebnosti in pogoje storitve
legal.checkboxMobile: I've read and I accept the

crashReporting.title: Crash Reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

profile.title: Ustvari profil
profile.body1: Ustvarite lahko več uporabniških računov, da organizirate svoje denarnice in izboljšate zasebnost.

body2.first: Začnimo z imenom vašega prvega uporabniškega računa.
body2.nonFirst: Začnimo z imenom vašega uporabniškega računa.

profile.addMore: Kasneje lahko dodate več uporabniških računov.

developer.label: Razvijalčev račun
developer.info: Connect to the devnet or a private network

setup.title: Nastavite denarnico
setup.chrysalisBody: Od 21. aprila 2021 lahko uporabniki svoje žetone preselijo v novo omrežje Chrysalis. Priporočamo, da svoje obstoječe žetone preselite čim prej.

secure.title: Zaščiti svojo denarnico
secure.body1: Shranite in natisnite PDF predlogo kompleta za obnovitev.
secure.body2: Če izpolnite obrazec Recovery Kit in ga varno shranite, boste vedno lahko obnovili svoje denarnice.

create.title: Ustvari denarnico
create.body: Ustvarite novo denarnico. Izberete lahko običajno softversko denarnico ali če imate napravo Ledger, lahko nastavite denarnico za strojno opremo.

softwareAccount.title: Želim softversko denarnico
softwareAccount.description: Ustvarite besedno zvezo za obnovitev s 24 besedami

ledgerAccount.title: Želim strojno denarnico
ledgerAccount.description: Potreben je računalnik Ledger Nano S ali Nano X

setupLedger.videoGuide: Video vodnik za migracijo glavne knjige

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Ali ste namestili potrebne aplikacije Ledger?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Preden nadaljujete, morate prek storitve Ledger Live poiskati in namestiti aplikacijo {legacy} in novo aplikacijo IOTA.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Prepričajte se, da je vdelana programska oprema računalnika Ledger posodobljena. Vse prednameščene aplikacije je treba posodobiti na najnovejše različice.

password.title: Ustvari geslo
password.body1: Za zaščito svojih sredstev potrebujete močno geslo. Uporabite kombinacijo besed in se izogibajte pogostim frazam, imenom ali datumom.
password.body2: Priporočljivo je, da si geslo zapišete v komplet za obnovitev.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Nastavite kodo PIN za prijavo, da lahko v svoj profil vstopite samo vi.

pin.title: Nastavi PIN kodo
pin.body1: Spodaj vnesite šestmestno kodo PIN. Za dostop do svojega profila boste morali navesti kodo PIN.

confirmPin.title: Preveri tvojo PIN kodo
confirmPin.body1: Vaš PIN zagotavlja zasebnost vašega stanja in transakcij.
confirmPin.body2: Re-enter your PIN code to proceed.

backup.title: Shrani tvojo denarnico
backup.body1: Prikazal se bo stavek za obnovitev. Zapišite si jo v svoj komplet za obnovo.
backup.body2: Svoju frázu o zotavení nikomu neposkytujte. Môže sa použiť na prístup k vašim tokenom odkiaľkoľvek.
backup.body3: Ak stratíte frázu na obnovenie, môžete prísť o svoje finančné prostriedky.

recoveryPhrase.title: Besedna zveza za okrevanje
recoveryPhrase.body1: V svoj komplet za obnovo zapišite besede v točno določenem vrstnem redu.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Naj bo to zasebno in varno shranjeno.
recoveryPhrase.body3: Pomembno je imeti pisno varnostno kopijo. Računalniki se pogosto pokvarijo in datoteke se lahko poškodujejo.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Kontrola frázy pre obnovenie
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Overíme si, či ste túto frázu zapísali správne. Vyberte jednotlivé slová v očíslovanom poradí.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Ne pozabite, da so zasebni in varno shranjeni.

backupWallet.title: Varnostna kopija v datoteko Stronghold
backupWallet.body1: Vnesite geslo za varnostno kopiranje denarnic v datoteko Stronghold. Vaše geslo se uporabi za šifriranje varnostne kopije.
backupWallet.body2: Razlogi, zakaj so digitalne varnostne kopije pomembne:
backupWallet.reason1: Enostavno obnovite denarnice, ne da bi vnesli besedno zvezo za obnovitev
backupWallet.reason2: Uvozite svoje denarnice v drugih napravah

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Uspešno varnostno kopiranje
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Svoje denarnice ste varnostno kopirali v Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Profile setup complete!
congratulations.body: Your new profile is ready to use.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: Sredstva ste uspešno prenesli v novo omrežje
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Račun Ledger je uspešno obnovljen in zdaj lahko nadaljujete.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: Uspešno ste prenesli knjigo Ledger v novo omrežje.
congratulations.exportMigration: Izvozite dnevnik migracije in dokončajte nastavitev

import.title: Obnovitev ali selitev sredstev
import.body: Če imate obstoječe seme ali varnostno datoteko denarnice, jo lahko uvozite tukaj. Če imate starejša sredstva v omrežju, vas bomo seznanili s koraki za prehod na omrežje Chrysalis.
import.importSeedDescription: Vnesite seme in prenesite sredstva v Chrysalis
import.importMnemonicDescription: Vnesite besedno zvezo za obnovitev in obnovite svoje denarnice
import.importLedgerDescription: Obnovitev ali selitev profila glavne knjige

seed.title: Vnesite svoje seme za začetek migracije
seed.body: Seme je sestavljeno iz 81 znakov. Uporablja se za obnovitev iz starejše aplikacije Trinity.

mnemonic.title: Vnesite besedno zvezo za obnovitev
mnemonic.body: Fraza za obnovitev je dolga 24 besed, vse male tiskane črke, med katerimi so presledki. Uporablja se za obnovitev obstoječih denarnic Firefly.
mnemonic.enter: Vnesite svoj skrivni stavek za obnovitev

importFromFile.title: Obnovitev denarnic z uporabo datoteke z varnostno kopijo
importFromFile.body: Uvozite varnostno datoteko in obnovite svoje denarnice. Varnostne kopije so lahko Stronghold (.stronghold) ali Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx).
importFromFile.bodyMobile: Upload a file to restore existing wallet funds. Only Firefly Stronghold backup is supported on mobile. For Trinity SeedVault backup, please use the  desktop wallet.

importFromLedger.title: Obnovitev ali migracija glavne knjige
importFromLedger.body: Obnovite obstoječi profil Firefly Ledger ali prenesite sredstva iz Trinityja.
importFromLedger.haveTrinityLedger: Imam varnostno kopijo knjige Trinity Ledger

connectLedger.title: Povežite svojo knjigo Ledger z aplikacijo Firefly
connectLedger.body: Da bo Firefly našel vašo napravo Ledger, poskrbite, da bo uradna aplikacija Ledger Live zaprta.
connectLedger.trafficLight1: Povežite in odklenite svojo knjigo Ledger s kodo PIN
connectLedger.trafficLight2: Odprite novo aplikacijo IOTA v svojem računalniku Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Nasveti, če se vaša knjiga Ledger ne poveže

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Obnovitev profila glavne knjige
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Pritisnite obnovi, da dokončate postopek nastavitve ter obnovite svoje denarnice, stanja in zgodovino transakcij.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Začnite migracijo Ledgerja z uporabo Fireflyja
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly vam bo pomagal prenesti žetone v novo omrežje Chrysalis.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: Po migraciji boste lahko žetone pošiljali in prejemali prek svoje knjige Ledger in Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: Kaj lahko pričakujete od postopka migracije

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Ustvari nov naslov
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: Za migracijo žetonov v Firefly morate ustvariti nov naslov. Za nadaljevanje kliknite spodnji gumb.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: Zaradi varnosti primerjajte naslov, ustvarjen v napravi Ledger, s tistim, ki je prikazan spodaj. Če se ujemata, pritisnite oba gumba na napravi Ledger.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: Potrdili ste, da se naslov v programu Firefly ujema z naslovom v napravi Ledger.

switchLedgerApps.title: Preklop aplikacij za glavno knjigo
switchLedgerApps.body: Za nadaljevanje migracije preklopite na aplikacijo {legacy} v napravi Ledger. Ko ste pripravljeni, pritisnite gumb Nadaljuj.

selectLedgerAccountIndex.title: Izberite indeks Ledger računa
selectLedgerAccountIndex.body: Izberite indeks računa v glavni knjigi, ki ste ga uporabili v programu Trinity. Za večino uporabnikov je to privzeti index 0.
selectLedgerAccountIndex.reinstallLegacy: Če ne, odklopite napravo in poskusite znova. Če se težava nadaljuje, boste morda morali znova namestiti aplikacijo {legacy}.

importBackupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

importSuccess.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
importSuccess.body: You can now set up your new profile.

migrate.title: Migrate your funds
migrate.body1: This is an automated process to transfer your funds to your new wallet.
migrate.body2: It may take some time. Do not turn off your device during the migration.
migrate.noAddressesForMigration: Please select the addresses you wish to secure.
migrate.noDataSeedVault: No data could be found in the SeedVault.
migrate.problemRestoringWallet: There was a network error restoring your wallet. Please try again.
migrate.minimumMigrationAmountSpentAddresses: The minimum migration amount for each spent address is 1 Mi. Check again if your balance doesn't look right.
migrate.tooManyAddressesToMigrate: You have too many addresses with a low balance to migrate. Check again if your total balance doesn't look right.
migrate.cannotMigrateAllYourFunds: We cannot migrate all of your funds because some addresses are too low in value. You can proceed anyway. {value} will be lost.
migrate.error: There was an error migrating your funds. Please try again.

bundleMiningWarning.title: Opozorilo
bundleMiningWarning.body1: You have funds on one or more spent addresses.
bundleMiningWarning.body2: We recommend you run an automated process to help secure and transfer these funds safely.
bundleMiningWarning.body3: It is not possible to guarantee your funds will be migrated securely on mobile. We recommend that you use the Firefly desktop app to migrate.

secureSpentAddresses.title: Secure spent addresses
secureSpentAddresses.body1: You have funds detected on {number, plural, one {# spent address} other {# spent addresses}}.
secureSpentAddresses.body2: We recommend you run an automated process to help secure and transfer your funds safely.
secureSpentAddresses.error: You can’t migrate spent addresses with less than 1 Mi

securityCheckCompleted.title: Security check completed
securityCheckCompleted.body1: We have calculated the security risk level. Running this process again may lower your risk level.
securityCheckCompleted.body2: When you are happy with the risk level(s) press continue.

securingSpentAddresses.title: Securing spent addresses...
securingSpentAddresses.body1: This process will take {minutes, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}}.
securingSpentAddresses.body2: Your computer will run at full capacity, you may wish to do something else while you wait for this to complete.

transferFragmentedFunds.body1: Firefly will now proceed to migrate your funds. This may take a while.
transferFragmentedFunds.body2: Ensure your Ledger is connected and the {legacy} app is open at all times during migration.

balance.title: Your balance
balance.body: Make sure your balance is correct before continuing. You can check again if things don't look correct.
balance.error: The minimum migration amount is 1 Mi. Check again if your balance doesn't look right.
balance.zeroBalance: Try checking again. If you still can't find your balance you might have entered your seed incorrectly.
balance.zeroBalanceLedgerLegacy: Try checking again. If you still can't find your balance you might have selected the wrong account index.

generalSettings.title: General
generalSettings.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

security.title: Varnost
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advancedSettings.title: Advanced
advancedSettings.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Pomoč in Informacije
helpAndInfo.description: Poiščite odgovor na vprašanje ali pomoč pri reševanju težave

profile.title: Profil
profile.description: spremenite ime svojega profila ali nastavite avatar

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: If you change your system theme, you may need to restart Firefly to see the effects

currency.title: Valuta
currency.description: Prilagaja pretvorbo ravnotežja in posodablja možnosti grafikona

networkStatus.title: Stanje omrežja
networkStatus.description: Prikaže stanje vozlišča, s katerim ste trenutno povezani

exportStronghold.title: Izvoz varnostne kopije
exportStronghold.description: Izvoz v datoteko Stronghold - popolno šifrirano varnostno kopijo denarnic in najnovejše zgodovine transakcij

appLock.title: Samodejno zaklepanje
appLock.description: Čas neaktivnosti, preden se vaše denarnice zaklenejo in ste odjavljeni

changePassword.title: Zamenjaj geslo
changePassword.description: Vaše geslo se uporablja za zaščito denarnic. Za zaščito svojih sredstev morate uporabljati močno geslo

changePincode.title: Spremeni PIN kodo
changePincode.description: Vaš PIN ohranja vaše stanje in transakcije zasebne

balanceFinder.title: Iskalnik ravnotežja
balanceFinder.description: Izvedite razširjeno iskanje žetonov v naslovih

hiddenAccounts.title: Skrite denarnice
hiddenAccounts.description: Z izbiro te možnosti se prikažejo denarnice, ki so bile prej skrite

deleteProfile.title: Izbriši profil
deleteProfile.description: Izbriše celoten profil, denarnice in zgodovino transakcij. Poskrbite za varnostno kopijo

deepLinks.title: Povezave IOTA
deepLinks.description: Samodejno izpolnite podatke o transakciji v Firefly, ko kliknete povezavo IOTA

networkConfiguration.title: Konfiguracija omrežja

description.dev: Nastavitve omrežja se bodo samodejno posodobile glede na trenutno konfiguracijo vozlišča (preklop omrežja bo povzročil ponastavitev stanja denarnice)
description.nonDev: Omrežne nastavitve se samodejno posodobijo glede na trenutno konfiguracijo vozlišča

networkConfiguration.resetWallet: Stanje vaše denarnice je bilo ponastavljeno.

nodeConfiguration.title: Izbira vozlišč
nodeConfiguration.description: Če želite konfigurirati nastavitve vozlišč in se povezati s svojim vozlišč(i), izberite "Ročno"

configureNodeList.title: Konfiguracija vozlišča
configureNodeList.description: Upravljanje seznama vozlišč, s katerimi se povezujete
configureNodeList.noNodes: Ni vozlišč, ni mogoče vzpostaviti povezave z omrežjem
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: Vozlišč ni, namesto tega se uporabi samodejna izbira

proofOfWork.title: Dokazilo o delu
proofOfWork.description: Izvedite dokazilo o delu lokalno v svoji napravi ali ga prenesite v vozlišče

crashReporting.title: Crash reports
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Firefly application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

diagnostics.title: Diagnostika
diagnostics.description: Ogled informacij o sistemu in aplikaciji

troubleshoot.title: Odpravljanje težav
troubleshoot.description: Za reševanje pogostih težav uporabite čarovnika za odpravljanje težav

documentation.title: Dokumentacija
documentation.description: Oglejte si dokumentacijo za poglobljene razlage delovanja

faq.title: Pogosta vprašanja
faq.description: Oglejte si pogosto zastavljena vprašanja in poiščite pomoč pri pogostih težavah ali vprašanjih

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Pridobite pomoč skupnosti IOTA na Discordu

reportAnIssue.title: Prijavite težavo
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported

login.pleaseWait: Please wait {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# incorrect attempt} other {# incorrect attempts}}

bodies.upcoming: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.commencing: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.holdingAndStaking: You automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.holdingAndNotStaking: Stake your {token} tokens to receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.endedAndDidStake: {token} rewards will be distributed to your wallet once the network launches.
bodies.endedAndDidNotStake: You did not participate in this airdrop.
bodies.endedAndDidNotReachMinRewards: You did not stake enough {token} tokens to reach the minimum airdrop rewards.
bodies.inactive: Open network configuration in the advanced settings and make sure the current node has the "Participation" feature by clicking "View info".

assembly.name: Assembly
assembly.description: Assembly is a permissionless, highly scalable multi-chain network to build and deploy composable smart contracts. Assembly is the future of web3.

shimmer.name: Shimmer
shimmer.description: The incentivized staging network to advance major innovations on IOTA. Whatever happens, happens. How Shimmer evolves is up to you.

info.title: Your voting weight
info.description1: Your voting weight is derived from your wallet balance. When a voting proposal is in the Counting phase, active votes are counted and accumulated every 10s.
info.description2: 1 Ki of voting weight (1000 IOTA tokens) yields 1 vote every 10s. This means you must continue voting for the full duration of the Counting phase in order to achieve your full voting weight.

info.title: Governance info
info.description: With the help of the IOTA Foundation, the IOTA community has developed an IOTA voting protocol, allowing you to participate in governance decisions by voting with your IOTA tokens in Firefly.

votingRate.title: Voting rate
votingRate.body: {amount} will generate {votesPerMilestone} votes every {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}.

countedVotes.title: Counted votes
countedVotes.body: Votes are counted at {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}} intervals throughout the Counting period. {amount} generates {votesPerMilestone} votes every {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}.

partiallyVoted.title: New unused funds: {amount}
partiallyVoted.body: You have received additional funds to {account}. You can vote with these tokens by merging your vote.

maximumVotes.title: Maximum votes
maximumVotes.body: You must keep voting for the remaining Counting period in order to reach your maximum votes.

notFound.title: Unable to load Community Treasury vote
notFound.subtitle: Please connect to a node that has added this vote

password.title: Geslo zahtevano
password.subtitle: Please enter your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

version.title: Current version: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: You are running the latest and safest version of Firefly.
version.noAutoUpdate: Samodejno posodabljanje je v tej različici sistema Windows onemogočeno, za prenos posodobitve obiščite spletno mesto https://firefly.iota.org.
version.preReleaseDescription: You are running a pre-release version of Firefly. Updates are disabled.

backup.title: Zadnja varnostna kopija: {datum}
backup.backupDescription: Pomembno je, da redno ustvarjate varnostne kopije in si tako zagotovite kopijo svojih denarnic in zgodovine transakcij.
backup.backupWarning: Če izgubite fazo varnostnega kopiranja in obnovitve, boste izgubili dostop do svojih sredstev.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: Niste naredili varnostne kopije svojih denarnic

deleteAccount.title: Izbriši {name}?
deleteAccount.body: Ta denarnica nima zgodovine transakcij. Lahko jo varno izbrišete.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Za potrditev vnesite geslo za denarnico.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: Te denarnice ne morete izbrisati, imeti morate vsaj eno.

hideAccount.title: Skrijte {name}?
hideAccount.body: To denarnico lahko kasneje najdete tako, da v naprednih nastavitvah omogočite možnost "Prikaži skrite denarnice".
hideAccount.typePassword: Za potrditev vnesite geslo za denarnico.
hideAccount.errorBody1: Če želite skriti denarnico, mora biti v njej 0 sredstev.
hideAccount.errorBody2: V tej denarnici imate trenutno še {balance}. Prosimo, da ta sredstva prenesete v drugo denarnico in poskusite znova.
hideAccount.errorBody3: Te denarnice ne morete skriti, imeti morate vsaj eno.

node.removeConfirmation: Ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to vozlišče?
node.removeAllConfirmation: Ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti vsa vozlišča?

switchNetwork.title: Omrežje stikal
switchNetwork.resetWarning: Če boste spremenili omrežje, se boste odjavili ter ponastavili vse račune, stanja in zgodovino transakcij za ta profil.
switchNetwork.typePassword: Type your password to switch to:

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

transaction.title: Confirm transaction
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccount: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that is currently being staked. This may unstake your tokens. Feel free to send the transfer but you may need to restake your remaining tokens afterwards.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccountBelowMinReward: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that has not yet reached the minimum staking rewards. This may unstake your tokens and you may lose your staking rewards on this wallet.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccountBelowMinRewardVo: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that has not yet reached the minimum staking rewards. This may unstake your tokens and you may lose your staking rewards on this wallet. You may also need to vote again.

sendingFromActiveParticipationAccount.stakeVote: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that is currently staking and voting. This may unstake your tokens and stop your vote. Feel free to send the transfer but you may need to restake and vote again with your remaining tokens afterwards.
sendingFromActiveParticipationAccount.stake: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that is currently being staked. This may unstake your tokens. Feel free to send the transfer but you may need to restake your remaining tokens afterwards.
sendingFromActiveParticipationAccount.vote: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that is currently voting. This may stop your vote. Feel free to send the transfer but you may need to vote again with your remaining tokens afterwards.

balanceFinder.title: Balance finder
balanceFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances and previous airdrop rewards. This may take a while.
balanceFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Press search again until your full balance is shown.
balanceFinder.typePassword: Type your password to allow searching.

riskFunds.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
riskFunds.body1: It is strongly recommended that you secure all your funds before proceeding with migration. Your funds are at risk of theft if you do not secure them.
riskFunds.body2: It is recommended that you rerun the process for addresses with a medium risk level or above.

missingBundle.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
missingBundle.body: You have funds on spent addresses, but the information needed to secure them was not found. This can happen if you made transactions a long time ago. You can proceed but {value} are at risk during migration.

snapshot.title: Ongoing network upgrade
snapshot.body: The Chrysalis network upgrade has begun.
snapshot.bodyMigration: Migration is disabled until it is complete.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: Firefly is disabled until it is complete. Token migration will still be possible afterwards.

ledgerNotConnected.connect: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger device to continue
ledgerNotConnected.connectLegacy: Open the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: To proceed, confirm the prompt displayed on your Ledger device

ledgerAppGuide.title: Guide to installing the Ledger apps

steps.0: Install and open the Ledger Live application
steps.1: Ensure that your Ledger is connected
steps.4: Remember that it's important to close Ledger Live before returning to Firefly

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

steps.0: Make sure Ledger Live is not open on your computer
steps.1: Ensure you have unlocked your Ledger device with your PIN
steps.2: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger device

3.link: Try the official Ledger support page

remainderAddress.title: Confirm remainder address
remainderAddress.info: Confirm that the remainder address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

transaction.title: Confirm transaction
transaction.info: Confirm that the transaction information displayed on your Ledger device matches the information displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

ledgerAddress.title: Confirm receive address
ledgerAddress.body: Confirm that the receive address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

ledgerMigrateIndex.title: Do you need to migrate another Trinity account index?
ledgerMigrateIndex.body: You can also migrate later in Advanced Settings.

exportTransactionHistory.title: Izvoz zgodovine transakcij
exportTransactionHistory.body: Izvozi zgodovino transakcij za izbrano denarnico. Izvožena datoteka bo v obliki .csv.

stakingManager.title: Staking Upravljanje
stakingManager.description: Ko položite denarnico, si pošljete transakcijo, v kateri so ta sredstva označena kot „staked". Svoje žetone žeton koli prenesete, vendar za polog ne boste več prejeli nagrad.
stakingManager.stakedSuccessfully: Vaša sredstva so bila staked na {account}.
stakingManager.unstakedSuccessfully: Vaša sredstva so bila preklicana za {account}.
stakingManager.mergeStakeDisclaimerVoting: Merging your stake will also merge your votes.

stakingConfirmation.title: Confirm Participation
stakingConfirmation.multiAirdropWarning: If you do not want to participate in both airdrops, you can opt-out below. You can unstake and restake to opt back in at any time.
stakingConfirmation.mergeStakeWarning: Your funds will be staked for {airdrop}. To change which airdrops you want to participate in, unstake this wallet and stake it again.

newStakingPeriodNotification.title: Staking phase {periodNumber} from {date}
newStakingPeriodNotification.body: IOTA staking for Assembly continues... Participate in phase {periodNumber} for 90 days. Stake your IOTA tokens and earn ASMB rewards!
newStakingPeriodNotification.info: Shimmer staking is now complete and only ASMB tokens will be distributed.

governanceManager.castYourVoteInfo: You're about to vote for Option {voteValue} ({voteText}) with {amount}
governanceManager.stopVotingInfo: Are you sure you want to stop voting for Option {voteValue} ({voteText})?
governanceManager.stopVotingDisclaimer: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted
governanceManager.changeVoteDisclaimer: Please note that changing your vote during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted
governanceManager.changeVoteInfo: Are you sure you want to change your vote to Option {voteValue} ({voteText})?
governanceManager.partialVoteInfo: You have received {amount} to {account}. You can vote with these funds by merging them with your current vote.
governanceManager.mergeVoteDisclaimer: Please note that merging votes won't impact any votes that have already been counted.
governanceManager.mergeVoteDisclaimerStaking: Merging your vote will also merge your staked funds.

successPopup.castBody: You are now voting for Option {voteValue} ({voteText}).
successPopup.stopBody: You have stopped voting. This does not impact votes that have already been counted.

shimmer-info.title: O podjetju Shimmer
shimmer-info.body1: Čestitamo, da ste kot nagrado za vložek prejeli žetone SMR. Shimmer je stimulirano omrežje za testiranje večjih nadgradenj na IOTA.
shimmer-info.body2: The Shimmer network has now launched, you can claim your tokens using the Firefly Shimmer app.

assembly-info.title: Približno Assembly
assembly-info.body1: Čestitamo, da ste kot nagrado za staking prejeli žetone ASMB. Assembly je večverižno omrežje za uvajanje skalabilnih pametnih pogodb na IOTA.
assembly-info.body2: Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

confirmDeveloperProfile.title: You are creating a developer profile
confirmDeveloperProfile.body: You will be connected to the Chrysalis Devnet by default, and can switch networks manually. Only continue if you know what you are doing.

confirmCloseApp.title: You are about to close the app
confirmCloseApp.body: Are you sure? go back again to close the app.

crashReporting.title: Crash reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Firefly.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Privacy Policy

singleAccountGuide.title: The way you use Firefly has changed
singleAccountGuide.body: The content of each tab is now in the context of a single wallet. You can change the selected wallet from anywhere by using the switcher in the title bar.
singleAccountGuide.hint: Can't find a wallet? Use the balance finder in the settings to discover previously used wallets.

mobileDeprecation.title: Deprecation announcement
mobileDeprecation.body: This version of Firefly is deprecated. The IOTA Foundation focuses on enabling core protocol functions through its desktop wallet. To maintain your tokens, we recommend either using Firefly for desktop or a 3rd-party wallet, by importing a Stronghold backup or 24-words backup.

actions.restoreWalletDescription: Selitev v Chrysalis ali obnovitev obstoječe denarnice
actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: Zapisal sem svoj stavek za okrevanje

general.scanQrOrPaste: Scan a QR code or paste an Address
general.firstSync: Sinhronizacija zgodovine lahko traja nekaj časa...
general.accountRemoved: This wallet is hidden. Unhide it to perform transfers.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# month} other {# months}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# year} other {# years}} ago

notifications.updateError: An error occurred during the update, please try again
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {# minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}
notifications.fundsAvailableSoon: Your funds will become available shortly

exportTransactionHistory.success: Transaction history for {accountAlias} was successfully saved to {filePath}
exportTransactionHistory.error: Unable to export transaction history for {accountAlias}

deepLinkingRequest.recievedWhileLoggedOut: Please login to initiate the IOTA link
deepLinkingRequest.invalidFormat: The IOTA link you followed is invalid

send.success: Payment details added from IOTA link

notifications.syncing: Please wait until synchronization is finished to change wallets.
notifications.transferring: Please wait until all transactions are completed to change wallets.
notifications.participating: Please wait until you have completed staking/voting before changing wallets.
notifications.transferringCreate: Please wait until all transactions are completed before adding a new wallet.
notifications.participatingCreate: Please wait until you have completed staking/voting before adding a new wallet.

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

delete.nonEmptyAccounts: You must transfer all balances before you can delete your profile.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.word: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {# digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your wallet name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest wallet before creating a new one.
account.emptyName: A profile name must contain at least 1 character.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this wallet.
account.duplicate: A wallet with this name already exists.
account.tilde: A profile name can't start with the '~' character.
account.control: A profile name can't contain a control character.
account.startDot: A profile name can't start with the '.' character.
account.chars: A profile name can't contain the following characters <>:"/\|?*
account.index: Your account index must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.page: Your account page must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.syncing: There was an error syncing your wallets.

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.
send.wrongAddressFormat: The address is not correctly formatted.
send.noToAccount: You have not selected a wallet to send the funds to.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.
send.transaction: There was an error sending your transaction. Please try again.

node.dns: Could not find DNS resolution for node.
node.handshake: Could not complete handshake with node.
node.invalidCertificate: Could not connect with invalid certificate.
node.https: HTTPS is required; insecure connections over HTTP are not supported at this time.
node.duplicate: This node has already been added.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.
node.answer: Failed to get an answer from all nodes.
node.pluginNotAvailable: The "{nodePlugin}" plugin is not available on the current node.

network.mismatch: The network ID for this node is "{networkId}", which does not match the current network.
network.notReachable: The network ID for this node could not be retrieved, unable to add node.
network.badNodes: Unable to connect to the network with current node configuration.
network.nonEmptyAccount: You must transfer all balances before switching networks.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is #} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is #} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
backup.phraseCaseWord: The word "{word}" should be lower case

ledger.appNotOpen: You must open the IOTA app on your Ledger device.
ledger.generic: There was an error connecting to your Ledger device.
ledger.legacyConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.locked: Please unlock your Ledger device by entering the PIN.
ledger.mnemonicMismatch: You have connected the wrong Ledger device or the mnemonic has changed.
ledger.otherConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.generateAddress: There was an error generating an address.
ledger.noStronghold: Unable to use Stronghold with Ledger profile.

popup.preventClose: This popup is unable to be closed.

migration.missingBundle: An error occurred while trying to find the transaction bundle.

crypto.cannotDecodeBech32: Unable to decode string as Bech32 address.

participation.cannotUseAccount: Unable to use the specified account.
participation.failedToFetchPreviousRewards: Failed to fetch previous rewards, please check your firewall settings.

node.http: Using nodes over HTTP leaves traffic unencrypted and could pose a security risk.

participation.noFunds: You do not have any IOTA.

partiallyStakedFunds.title: New unstaked funds: {amount}
partiallyStakedFunds.preBody: You have received tokens that are not staked.
partiallyStakedFunds.body: You need to manually stake these new funds to receive airdrop rewards for them.

stakingMinRewards.title: Below minimum reward value
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalance: This wallet does not have enough IOTA tokens to reach the minimum airdrop reward and cannot therefore be staked.
stakingMinRewards.bodyBelowMin: This wallet has not reached the minimum reward value for {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillReachMin: You must stake for another {duration} to reach the minimum.
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillNotReachMin: You will not reach the minimum reward value during the remaining staking period unless you add more IOTA.
stakingMinRewards.bodyDidNotReachMin: You did not stake enough IOTA to reach the minimum reward value for {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalanceAirdrop: This wallet does not have enough IOTA tokens to reach the minimum airdrop reward for {airdrop}.

shimmerTokenFormatting.title: Shimmer unit update
shimmerTokenFormatting.body1: SMR units have changed following a governance decision. Shimmer tokens are now displayed with 6 decimal places; 1 SMR = 1,000,000 glow.
shimmerTokenFormatting.body2: You still have the same amount of SMR rewards, Firefly just formats the value differently.

developerProfileIndicator.warningText: You are currently using a developer profile and are connected to {networkName}

camera.request: We need your permission to use your camera to be able to scan QR codes.
camera.requestInAppSettings: If you want to grant permission for using your camera to scan QR codes, please enable it in the app settings.
